forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 44F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 4C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 40F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 7C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 41F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 44F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 33F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
